name: Bridge to Another World: Burnt Dreams HD - Hidden Objects, Adventure & Mystery
name_original: Bridge to Another World: Burnt Dreams HD - Hidden Objects, Adventure & Mystery
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

You’ll never forget the day the monstrous mist rose up and snatched away your little brother while you watched helplessly from the bridge. Can you face your fears and help your brother finally escape the mysterious island where his dreams come to life – or will the whole world be consumed by the mist?

• EXPLORE A LAND WHERE PAINTINGS COME TO LIFE!
Dreams and reality are intertwined in this mystical world where imagination turns deadly.

• CONFRONT AN EVIL COUNTESS
Your brother has been held hostage by an evil woman who keeps him painting creatures she has learned to burn into reality!

• DEFEAT THE MIST AND FIND YOUR BROTHER
Wander through fascinating locations to find hidden objects and use your wits to solve puzzles and mini-games on your quest to save your brother.

• UNLOCK THIS COLLECTOR’S EDITION TO ACCESS EXCLUSIVE EXTRAS!
Replay all of your favorite puzzles and uncover exciting new quests! Unlock collectibles and achievements and enjoy stunning wallpapers and concept art.

*This game is best experienced on iPhone 4s/iPod Touch 5th gen and up.*
